name: Quantstamp
headline: Security auditing for Web3
description:
Quantstamp has protected billions in digital assets from hackers on our mission to secure web3. As a global team of security professionals, we have honed our technology and expertise through hundreds of audits and gained the trust of our clients to keep their innovative products safe.

In addition to providing an array of security services, we facilitate the growth and longevity of the web3 space through strategic investments and acting as a trusted advisor to help projects scale. Quantstamp is honored to have worked with some of the top projects in the industry including Aave, Compound, Maker, OpenSea, Polygon and many more.

As the leading blockchain security company in this emerging industry, we are always looking for team members that love taking initiative and solving challenging problems. Join the team and help us secure the future of web3.

Why Quantstamp
Since 2017, we’ve worked with some of the most recognized names in web3. Discover why hundreds of clients trust Quantstamp to secure their projects.
Our team hails from companies such as the Ethereum Foundation, Google, Meta, MathWorks, Microsoft and others, with deep expertise in formal verification, static analysis, blockchain audits, penetration testing, and original leading-edge research.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5bb269510fd6bf857fcd50c7/65709edfaaa9f3d9c83915a4_ethereum-foundation.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5bb269510fd6bf857fcd50c7/65709edf2b7a6f217f11e601_google.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5bb269510fd6bf857fcd50c7/65709edf6067bd5dbe9bcdd0_meta.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5bb269510fd6bf857fcd50c7/65709edf982c6d86b45456c3_mathworks.png)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5bb269510fd6bf857fcd50c7/65d614d287f7437f614f9b1b_microsoft.svg)
Quantstamp is familiar with a wide range of programming languages and has audited Layer 1s, Layer 2s, DeFi protocols, NFT marketplaces, exchanges, clients, and more. Our team has extensive experience with meta-languages and compilers, both in academia and in the field.
Quantstamp provides managed security services for continuous security and monitoring post-deployment. Our insurance product, Chainproof, secures customers against smart contract hacks and slashing risks.
Quantstamp is securing web3 through our audits and security services, while also building the future of the ecosystem through our products, partnerships, investments, and education.We have secured two Ethereum 2.0 clients, Prysm and Teku, and received multiple grants from the Ethereum Foundation for L2 security and scaling.

In recent months, AI agents have attracted significant attention by the promise of assisting users and automating complex processes across diverse applications. The rapid performance improvements of Large Language Models (LLMs) in natural language processing (NLP) tasks drive this trend. However, as the capabilities and reach of these agents expand, so do the risks. Why Quantstamp
Since 2017, we’ve worked with some of the most recognized names in web3. Discover why hundreds of clients trust Quantstamp to secure their projects.
Our team hails from companies such as the Ethereum Foundation, Google, Meta, MathWorks, Microsoft and others, with deep expertise in formal verification, static analysis, blockchain audits, penetration testing, and original leading-edge research.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5bb269510fd6bf857fcd50c7/65709edfaaa9f3d9c83915a4_ethereum-foundation.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5bb269510fd6bf857fcd50c7/65709edf2b7a6f217f11e601_google.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5bb269510fd6bf857fcd50c7/65709edf6067bd5dbe9bcdd0_meta.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5bb269510fd6bf857fcd50c7/65709edf982c6d86b45456c3_mathworks.png)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5bb269510fd6bf857fcd50c7/65d614d287f7437f614f9b1b_microsoft.svg)
Quantstamp is familiar with a wide range of programming languages and has audited Layer 1s, Layer 2s, DeFi protocols, NFT marketplaces, exchanges, clients, and more. Our team has extensive experience with meta-languages and compilers, both in academia and in the field.
Quantstamp provides managed security services for continuous security and monitoring post-deployment. Our insurance product, Chainproof, secures customers against smart contract hacks and slashing risks.
Quantstamp is securing web3 through our audits and security services, while also building the future of the ecosystem through our products, partnerships, investments, and education.We have secured two Ethereum 2.0 clients, Prysm and Teku, and received multiple grants from the Ethereum Foundation for L2 security and scaling.

Commitment to Web3's Future
Quantstamp is securing web3 through our audits and security services, while also building the future of the ecosystem through our products, partnerships, investments, and education.We have secured two Ethereum 2.0 clients, Prysm and Teku, and received multiple grants from the Ethereum Foundation for L2 security and scaling.

When AI Meets Blockchain: A Guide to Securing the Next Frontier
In recent months, AI agents have attracted significant attention by the promise of assisting users and automating complex processes across diverse applications. The rapid performance improvements of Large Language Models (LLMs) in natural language processing (NLP) tasks drive this trend. However, as the capabilities and reach of these agents expand, so do the risks. The rapid pace of development, combined with the intricacies of integrating LLMs into real-world infrastructures—especially in dynamic fields like blockchain—has created an urgent need to scrutinize them for security, compliance, and operational integrity.

generated_description:
### Quantstamp Overview

**Founded:** 2017  
**Location:** Toronto, Canada  
**Team Size:** 80 employees  
**Group Partner:** Nan  
**Y Combinator Batch:** W18  
**Website:** [quantstamp.com](https://quantstamp.com)

---

**Mission:**  
Quantstamp is laser-focused on **security auditing for Web3**, aiming to secure billions in digital assets from hackers. As a global leader in blockchain security, they've established themselves by performing hundreds of thorough audits, gaining trust from some of the industry's top projects.

**Core Services:**  
Quantstamp offers a range of security solutions:

1. **Smart Contract Audits:** Expert security assessments of web3 applications.
2. **Audit Readiness Guide:** Helping projects prepare for security audits effectively.
3. **Infrastructure Audits:** Ensuring configuration security for web3 infrastructures.
4. **Economic Exploit Analysis:** Analyzing potential economic attacks and providing mitigation strategies.
5. **Insurance:** World's first regulated smart contract insurer through their product, Chainproof.
6. **DeFi Protection:** Providing security for DeFi deposits.

**Notable Clients:**  
They’ve had the privilege to work with significant projects like **Aave**, **Compound**, **Maker**, **OpenSea**, and **Polygon**—just to name a few.

---

**Work Culture:**  
Quantstamp thrives on innovation. They seek team members who take initiative and love tackling complex challenges. Joining Quantstamp means being part of a mission to defend the burgeoning world of Web3.

**Industry Impact:**  
With over **$200 billion in digital assets secured** and **750+ audits** conducted, Quantstamp is an influential player in the ecosystem. Their expertise not only enhances security but also facilitates the scaling of projects in the blockchain space.

**Community Engagement:**  
Quantstamp is dedicated to fostering the growth of the Web3 landscape through **strategic investments** and acting as a trusted advisor for projects looking to scale.

The company remains committed to building a robust ecosystem filled with security and innovation for the future.

---

**Conclusion:**  
If you're looking to ensure your Web3 project is reliable and secure, Quantstamp offers the expertise you need. Interested parties can easily reach out through their website for audit requests or career opportunities, heralding a safe and smart future in blockchain.
